content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Course helps to understand how to define project quality, identify quality-planning components, perform quality assurance, examine the cost of quality. Also lists types of quality tools, describes the tenets of Pareto analysis, explains the House of Quality approach, how to apply Lean Six Sigma, defines test deliverables and roles.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To-Do:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Study\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=99979320-2693-4049-98d4-f5afa286b2e9\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \\rProject Management Foundations: Quality \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"course as e-learner.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
